div.p: Expansion based on SNOMED CT International edition 01-Feb 2024
This value set expansion contains 58 concepts.

tr.td: Inclined standing in water towards rail
Inclined standing in water away from rail
Supine and quarter turn to right - foot bed raised 14 inches
Supine and quarter turn to left - bed tipped 14 inches
Prone with pillow under hips - foot bed raised 18 inches
Right side-lying with 45 degree turn onto face and pillows under shoulders
Left side-lying with 45 degree turn onto face
Prone on a Relton Hall frame
Patient in supine position with hip support (finding)
Prone body position for enteral nutrition administration
Supine body position for enteral nutrition administration
